Bivariate Analysis

Aravind Hebbali

2018-01-17

library(blorr)
library(magrittr)

Introduction

blr_bivariate_analysis(hsb2, honcomp, prog)
#>                          Bivariate Analysis                           
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Variable    Information Value    LR Chi Square    LR DF    LR p-value 
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------
#>   prog            0.44              16.1450         2        3e-04    
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------

Weight of Evidemce & Information Value

Introduction

blr_woe_iv(hsb2, female, honcomp)
#>                          Weight of Evidence                           
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------
#> levels    0s_count    1s_count    0s_dist    1s_dist     woe      iv  
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------
#>   0          73          18         0.5       0.34      -0.39    0.06 
#>   1          74          35         0.5       0.66      0.28     0.04 
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------
#> 
#>       Information Value       
#> -----------------------------
#> Variable    Information Value 
#> -----------------------------
#>  female            0.1        
#> -----------------------------

Plot

blr_woe_iv(hsb2, female, honcomp) %>%
  plot

Response Distribution by Segments

Introduction

blr_segment_dist(hsb2, honcomp, prog)
#>          Event Segmentation           
#> -------------------------------------
#>   prog       n     1s     n%     1s%  
#> -------------------------------------
#>    1        45     7     0.22    0.04 
#>    2        105    40    0.52    0.20 
#>    3        50     6     0.25    0.03 
#> -------------------------------------

Plot

blr_segment_dist(hsb2, honcomp, prog) %>%
  plot

Response Distribution by Multiple Segments

blr_twoway_segment(hsb2, honcomp, prog, female)

Response Distribution

blr_segment(hsb2, honcomp, prog)
#> Event By Attributes 
#> -------------------
#> prog           1s%  
#> -------------------
#>  1             0.04 
#>  2             0.20 
#>  3             0.03 
#> -------------------
